name: Mushy Moon
description:
Explore the world below as Mushy Moon the mushroom. Experience diverse levels with simple controls. Relax with the sights and sounds of nature. Play with a friend in splitscreen mode. Replay levels to try to beat the Time Challenges and Least Jump Challenges. Search for hidden collectable models and view them up-close.

Get the Mushy Moon Coloring and Activity Book when you pay an extra $1 (or buy it separately.)

Features
  • Relaxing Nature Environments
  • 40 Colorful Levels
  • Two-player Co-op Splitscreen
  • 32 Hidden Collectable Models to View
  • Least Jump and Time Challenges Unlock Bonus Levels
  • 4 Save Files
  • Export/Import your Save Files on Android 4.4+
Input Methods
  • Keyboard (mouse is optional)
  • Gamepad
  • Touchscreen (Android, Web Browser)

Multiplayer requires two gamepads or a keyboard and a gamepad.

Requirements
  • Android: 2.3 or newer
    • Only download the HTML APK if the other one can't install on your device.
  • Linux: Tested on Ubuntu 16.4.1
    • dependencies info included with download
  • Mac: Tested on 10.11.6
  • Windows: 7/8/8.1/10
System Permissions
  • Android: none
  • Windows: no UAC prompt
Latest Update

Version 1.0
